mapper.select: SELECT R.REST_ATTD_NO AS REST_ATTD_NO , R.EMP_CODE AS EMP_CODE , R.DEPT_CODE AS DEPT_CODE , R.ATTD_CODE AS ATTD_CODE , R.ATTD_TYPE AS ATTD_TYPE , TO_CHAR(R.REQUEST_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS REQUEST_DATE , TO_CHAR(R.START_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS START_DATE , TO_CHAR(R.END_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS END_DATE , SUBSTR(R.START_TIME, 1, 2)||':'||SUBSTR(R.START_TIME, 3, 2) AS START_TIME , SUBSTR(R.END_TIME, 1, 2)||':'||SUBSTR(R.END_TIME, 3, 2) AS END_TIME , R.CAUSE AS CAUSE , R.APPROVAL_STATUS AS APPROVAL_STATUS , E.AUTHORITY AS AUTHORITY FROM REST_ATTD_MANAGE R, EMP E WHERE R.EMP_CODE = E.EMP_CODE AND R.DEPT_CODE = #{deptCode} AND R.REQUEST_DATE BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} AND SUBSTR(E.AUTHORITY, -1) <= SUBSTR(#{authLevel}, -1) AND R.ATTD_TYPE IN ('공가', '병가', '출장', '외근', '교육', '외출', '조퇴', '초과근무')
SELECT MAX(REST_ATTD_NO) FROM REST_ATTD_MANAGE WHERE REST_ATTD_NO LIKE '%'||#{requestDay}||'%'

SELECT E.EMP_NAME AS EMP_NAME, R.REST_ATTD_NO AS REST_ATTD_NO, R.DEPT_CODE AS DEPT_CODE, TO_CHAR(R.START_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS START_DATE, TO_CHAR(R.END_DATE , 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS END_DATE, R.ATTD_TYPE AS ATTD_TYPE, R.CAUSE AS CAUSE, R.APPROVAL_STATUS AS APPROVAL_STATUS, (A.REMAIN_BREAK_ATTD - EMP_COUNT.EMP_NAME_COUNT) AS REMAIN_BREAK_ATTD, E.AUTHORITY AS AUTHORITY FROM REST_ATTD_MANAGE R JOIN ( SELECT E.EMP_CODE, E.POSITION_CODE, P.POSITION, DECODE( P.POSITION, '인턴', 5, '사원', 15, '대리', 16, '팀장', 17, '상무', 20, '대표이사', 23) AS REMAIN_BREAK_ATTD FROM EMP E JOIN POSITION P ON E.POSITION_CODE = P.POSITION_CODE ) A ON R.EMP_CODE = A.EMP_CODE JOIN EMP E ON R.EMP_CODE = E.EMP_CODE LEFT JOIN ( SELECT EMP_CODE, NVL(SUM(CASE WHEN APPROVAL_STATUS = '승인' AND ATTD_TYPE = '연차' THEN 1 WHEN APPROVAL_STATUS = '승인' AND ATTD_TYPE LIKE '%반차' THEN 0.5 END), 0) AS EMP_NAME_COUNT FROM REST_ATTD_MANAGE WHERE ATTD_TYPE IN ('오전반차', '오후반차', '연차') AND TO_CHAR(START_DATE, 'YYYY-MM') BETWEEN SUBSTR('2024-03', 1, 4) || '-01' AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM') GROUP BY EMP_CODE) EMP_COUNT ON E.EMP_CODE = EMP_COUNT.EMP_CODE WHERE R.ATTD_TYPE IN ('오전반차', '오후반차', '연차') AND SUBSTR(E.AUTHORITY, -1) <= SUBSTR(#{authLevel}, -1) AND TO_CHAR(R.START_DATE, 'YYYY-MM') = #{useDate} GROUP BY E.EMP_NAME, R.REST_ATTD_NO, R.DEPT_CODE, R.START_DATE, R.END_DATE, R.ATTD_TYPE, R.CAUSE, R.APPROVAL_STATUS, A.REMAIN_BREAK_ATTD, EMP_COUNT.EMP_NAME_COUNT, E.AUTHORITY ORDER BY E.EMP_NAME, R.START_DATE
